sentences: Isaias Matiaba (Greek: Ησαΐας Ματιάμπα) (born 18 December 1983 in Ioannina, Greece) is a Greek singer and songwriter.
Isaias Matiaba was born in Ioannina, Greece on 18 December 1983 to a Congolese father and a Greek mother.
From an early age, he began studying classical piano and took classical singing lessons.
